title: Bought 20 Euros worth of RP, there was an error, didnt receive my RP
body:
Hi
I just bought 20 euros of RP, and it said to me that there was an error and that i should check with my bank ( something like this ), i got charged on my bank account and still i didnt receive any RP.

I wanted to get some RPs to buy the new PROJECT VAYNE {{champion:67}}  and PROJECT JHIN {{champion:202}}  skins yet im left confused and to be honest im a little worried because 20 euros isn't something i can regularly afford to pay for an online game.

I was so hyped for these Skins.

Did anyone get the same problem ?

PS : i already started a ticket, and if by any means a rioter sees this please check : **TICKET #32455238**

replies.body:
Just wanted to leave feedback so here it is!
I contacted support they said that if the payment didnt go through then it should be back to me in a few days ( 5 days max ).
I ended up waiting a bit more than that because of my bank, but in the end i still got my money back !
Support was very helpful and made understanding the process alot easier. so thanks to them for beign awesome.

You'll need to have all of those billing issues handled in your ticket! I can see that ticket in the queue, but it needs to be handled by billing peeps, and I'm clearly on Social Media xD! In the future remember that these sensitive issues have to be handled in tickets.
